AboutPage.description: Hello, I am a Full Stack Web Developer and currently a Computer Science student. I have experience working as Front-end for an international consultancy, where I have developed skills in React, TS, Next. In addition to my Front-end skills, I have solid knowledge in Back-end, including Node.js, Python, SQL and NoSQL databases I am looking for an opportunity to apply and expand my Full Stack skills, contributing innovative solutions to your team
